sentences: William Reese Perkins ((1924-07-22)July 22, 1924 – (2003-08-10)August 10, 2003) was an American cool jazz saxophonist and flutist, popular on the West Coast jazz scene, known primarily as a tenor saxophonist.
Born in San Francisco, California, United States, Perkins started performing in the big bands of Woody Herman and Jerry Wald.
He was also a member of The Tonight Show Band from 1970–1992 and The Lighthouse All-Stars.
In the 1960s, Perkins had a second career as a recording engineer.
He died of cancer in his Sherman Oaks home at the age of 79.
